documents.title: XP Level System Overview
documents.content: Cloudora uses a gamified XP system to make learning fun. Employees earn XP for training completion, CRM discipline, call quality, teamwork, punctuality, and performance.

documents.title: XP Rewards and Levels
documents.content: Levels: Level 1 Beginner (0 XP), Level 2 Learner (200 XP), Level 3 Professional (600 XP), Level 4 Expert (1200 XP), Level 5 Elite (2500 XP). Rewards include certificates, badges, priority tasks, incentives and leadership roles.
